## Description {#details}

The implementation for the loop nest analysis.

<SectionDefinition>

## Functions

### checkLoopsStructure() {#aa476d5315e502f74f064165e49a3ff9b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool checkLoopsStructure (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp; OuterLoop, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp; InnerLoop, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp; SE)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Determine whether the loops structure violates basic requirements for perfect nesting:

<ul>
<li>the inner loop should be the outer loop&#39;s only child</li>
<li>the outer loop header should &#39;flow&#39; into the inner loop preheader or jump around the inner loop to the outer loop latch</li>
<li>if the inner loop latch exits the inner loop, it should &#39;flow&#39; into the outer loop latch. Returns true if the loop structure satisfies the basic requirements and false otherwise.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="#l00315">315</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopnestanalysis-cpp">LoopNestAnalysis.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Succ : BI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#a254b2cfabe80269ee4f53f6698452db6">successors</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ensure the inner loop guard successor is empty before skipping</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PotentialOuterLatch == OuterLoopLatch)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If &#96;InnerLoopExit&#96; contains LCSSA Phi instructions, additional block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// may be inserted before the &#96;OuterLoopLatch&#96; to which &#96;BI&#96; jumps. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loops are still considered perfectly nested if the extra block only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// contains Phi instructions from InnerLoopExit and OuterLoopHeader.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InnerLoopExitContainsLCSSA &amp;&amp; IsExtraPhiBlock(&#42;Succ) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Succ-&gt;getSingleSuccessor() == OuterLoopLatch) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Points to the extra block so that we can reference it later in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// final check. We can also conclude that the inner loop is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// guarded and there exists LCSSA Phi node in the exit block later if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we see a non-null &#96;ExtraPhiBlock&#96;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlight">          ExtraPhiBlock = Succ;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a3fcdc9f30e5e8b9ea4da99868a8ae4a9">DEBUG&#95;WITH&#95;TYPE</a>(<a href="#ab3595005ef7c117f30d4c18201190bbb">VerboseDebug</a>, &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Inner loop guard successor &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; Succ-&gt;getName()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; doesn&#39;t lead to inner loop preheader or &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;outer loop latch.\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ensure the inner loop exit block lead to the outer loop latch possibly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// through empty blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((!ExtraPhiBlock ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">       &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopnest/#a0c3d91a5a6e71c114dea21819cc71382">LoopNest::skipEmptyBlockUntil</a>(InnerLoop.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#ab48af53a5000ecede46c76dabb4578d2">getExitBlock</a>(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      ExtraPhiBlock) != ExtraPhiBlock) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (&amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopnest/#a0c3d91a5a6e71c114dea21819cc71382">LoopNest::skipEmptyBlockUntil</a>(InnerLoop.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#ab48af53a5000ecede46c76dabb4578d2">getExitBlock</a>(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      OuterLoopLatch) != OuterLoopLatch)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a3fcdc9f30e5e8b9ea4da99868a8ae4a9">DEBUG&#95;WITH&#95;TYPE</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="#ab3595005ef7c117f30d4c18201190bbb">VerboseDebug</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlight">               &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; does not directly lead to the outer loop latch.\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
